name: Siege (jvpo)
description:
A boardgame for 2 players, in a local multiplayer, compete for control of the island.

Using the siege technique try to control the island getting enemies out of the way. Fight for victory!

There are 2 ways to win, control 3 castles as quickly as possible or push the  enemy army into the sea.

This game is an original creation with unique and fun rules, inspired by classic games like chess and checkers

Use your brain to create a winning strategy!
